reviewText:
ELEMENTARY ALL OVER AGAIN, I LOVE IT
I CAN WATCH THIS OVER AND OVER AND OVER AGAIN
NEEDS TO RETURN TO TV

As a fellow Invader zim fan, I bought this product to add to my collection. But overall, I think if you were interested in buying episodes from the series because this is only the first episode. The DVD's are on various sites but go for some big $$$ so your best bet would be buying the episodes on Amazon Instant Video. But if your interested in collecting Zim merchandise, I would definitely buy this product!

I didn't read the product description and was disappointed when I received not the first DVD with 6 episodes plus extras, but a mini DVD with the first episode only. This first episode doesn't have the opening music and animation of the rest of the series - one of the things that I personally most wanted. I blame myself for being a lazy consumer - don't YOU be one!
